MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA5 postcode area of Johnstone. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:15pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers are on their way to investigate the fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:29pm on Saturday, 20 March 2021
